description: i am severely disabled so im looking forward to finding blue bage spaces with OM as it can be very difficult finding them. i have classic autism and mild learning disability so for me the app hhas got to be simple enough and clear for me to process. this will come in handy so thankyou very much for developing this. works fab on my steam deck.   in terms of disabled/blue badge parking,do you need any community help with finding these spaces as i imagine itd take alot of work? also is it possible to make the layout a little clearer for disabled or ESOL users? maybe offering tips or pictorials on each field/icon when someone hovers it. i pay for a makaton subscription so if you want any pictorials id love to help.
Looks nice ..but why does trying to drag the map into place with your mouse, drag the whole app window out of place?
I love it; also great on Android.
add more like bus rutes and info etc....
not usable with mouse and keyboard. no labels on buttons, click and drag drags the whole window, etc. works great on mobile.
